table.name: vtiger_vchat
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vchat` ( `vchatid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` text, PRIMARY KEY (`vchatid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_vchatcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vchatcf` ( `vchatid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vchatid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
